question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. tennis ball
B. "polo" sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The tennis ball is in the foreground, actively being hit by the player, while the "polo" sign is on the far wall in the background, making the depth relationship very obvious.
